effect_entries.effect: Teaches Dark Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Frost Breath to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dark Pulse)

flavor_text_entries.text:
冷たい　息を
相手に　吹きつけて　攻撃する。
必ず　急所に　当たる。

The user blows its cold breath on the
target. This attack always results in
a critical hit.

Chi la usa attacca il bersaglio con un soffio
d’aria gelida.
Brutto colpo assicurato.

Genera mucha fuerza y ataca con gran energía
al objetivo. También puede usarse para mover
piedras grandes.

Anwender greift an, indem er dem Ziel eisigen
Atem entgegenhaucht. Volltreffergarantie.

Un souffle froid blesse l’ennemi.
L’effet est toujours critique.

차가운 숨결을
상대에게 내뿜어 공격한다.
반드시 급소에 맞는다.

つめたい　いきを
あいてに　ふきつけて　こうげきする。
かならず　きゅうしょに　あたる。

The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results in
a critical hit.

The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results in
a critical hit.

Un souffle froid blesse l’ennemi.
L’effet est toujours critique.

The user releases a horrible aura
imbued with dark thoughts. It may also
make the target flinch.

The user releases a horrible aura
imbued with dark thoughts. It may also
make the target flinch.

imbued with dark thoughts. It may also
make the target flinch.
